name: part_004
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】紫咲シオン 5th Anniversary LIVE【#紫咲シオン5周年記念⁠】 [KdFYu1feK30]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Murasaki Shion, Nekomata Okayu, and Tokoyami Towa performing the song 'Bring It On' (劣等上等).
Scene transition from the street-themed stage to the main concert stage.
Murasaki Shion and Mori Calliope performing the song 'Roki' (ロキ).

subtitles.original: さあ、バー、いつになったら貰える合格
subtitles.english: Come on, bar, when will I get a passing grade?

subtitles.original: 赤ペン入れてよ どっかダメなんですか？
